title: Keeva's Killer
description: A forbidden one night stand fuels my obsession with ravishing Keeva - my best friend’s sister.We never should have slept together, but I made Keeva mine months ago, and I’m not giving up on our forbidden love. Now, her brother’s made me her keeper, and I’m supposed to keep her safe… and keep my hands to myself.But I don’t want to be the stunning beauty’s bodyguard - I want to be her husband. With my dark, secret past in underground fighting clubs, I’m determined to fight for what I want, and that’s Keeva.Except Keeva’s hiding a dark secret, too - she’s a sugar baby and now she has a stalker out to get her.I’ll kill to make her mine and to keep her safe. Pretty Keeva has no idea what she’s getting into when she climbs back into my bed… Because I’m never letting go.Keeva’s Killer is a full-length standalone dark mafia romance, part of the Mafia Heirs Gallaghers series. All books can be enjoyed as standalones
author: Raven  Scott
